heading: HR00019
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEES ON ECOLOGY AND HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PROPOSED LAGUNA LAKESHORE EXPRESSWAY DIKE, APPRAISING ITS POSSIBLE INIMICAL EFFECTS ON THE WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITIES LIVING ALONG ITS SHORES, AS WELL AS ON THE BIODIVERSITY AND ECOLOGICAL BALANCE OF LAGUNA DE BAY, WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF DETERMINING WHETHER THE PROJECT IS BENEFICIAL OR DETRIMENTAL TO THE INTERESTS OF THE FILIPINO PEOPLE
status: Pending with the Committee on SOUTHERN TAGALOG DEVELOPMENT since 2017-02-06
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00019
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEES ON ECOLOGY AND HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PROPOSED LAGUNA LAKESHORE EXPRESSWAY DIKE, APPRAISING ITS POSSIBLE INIMICAL EFFECTS ON THE WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITIES LIVING ALONG ITS SHORES, AS WELL AS ON THE BIODIVERSITY AND ECOLOGICAL BALANCE OF LAGUNA DE BAY, WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF DETERMINING WHETHER THE PROJECT IS BENEFICIAL OR DETRIMENTAL TO THE INTERESTS OF THE FILIPINO PEOPLE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SOUTHERN TAGALOG DEVELOPMENT ON 2017-02-06
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-07-26;PRIMARILY REFERRED TO PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS on 2016-09-05;
